name: Escape Velocity (kadzu)
description:
Escape Velocity is a game made for the UE4 summer jam(2019).

Quick Rundown: You're on a space station, it's had a big failure and is about to impact the planet it is orbiting. You have 8 minutes to repair the escape shuttle and get out of there.

Controls

Movement - WASD
Sprint - Shift
Jump - Spacebar
Pickup - E
Store - Q
Retrieve - R
